events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund as it does not fit well and I am not satisfied with the product.
The customer's request has been categorized under the 'Refund' cluster due to mention of refund and dissatisfaction.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and will assist the customer shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed so we can proceed with your refund?
My order number is 1234567890, and the jacket has not been worn or washed yet. I just want to return it as it is too small.
Thanks for the info. We can proceed with your refund after you return the jacket in its original packaging. I will email you the return shipment label shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and help. I appreciate receiving the return label via email so I can send back the jacket as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your credit card statement within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything was handled to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Closing this case now as the refund was completed successfully and the customer has not indicated any further issues. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback is valuable to help us improve our service.
